snippet: Walter Hill, whose previous films include "The Warriors" and "48 Hrs.," will direct a remake of "Whatever Happened to Baby Jane?" The 1962 Robert Aldrich thriller starred Joan Crawford as a paralyzed former movie star and Bette Davis as her abusive...
abstract: Walter Hill, whose previous films include "The Warriors" and "48 Hrs.," will direct a remake of "Whatever Happened to Baby Jane?" The 1962 Robert Aldrich thriller starred Joan Crawford as a paralyzed former movie star and Bette Davis as her abusive sister.

headline.main: Whatever Happened to 'Baby Jane'? It's Getting a Remake
headline.print_headline: What About ‘Baby Jane’? It’s Getting a Remake
